titles: A proclamation, for a solemn and publick thanksgiving.
author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Scotland. Sovereign (1689-1694 : William and Mary)
publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, Printer to their most excellent Majestys,
notes: Dated: Given under Our Signet, at Holy-rood-house, the seventeenth day of September, one thousand six hundred and ninety, and of Our Reign the second year.
Signed: Da. Moncreif, Cls. Secreti Concilii.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
